intro: Epidendrum paraguastigma, commonly known as the Paraguay flame orchid, is a tropical epiphytic orchid native to South America. It is characterized by its striking, brightly colored flowers that resemble flames, typically in shades of red and orange. The plant has a robust, branched stem and produces large, showy inflorescences with numerous flowers.
